Html:
Hi,

I have seen the code today and started to "hack" it immediately. I am new to ASP.NET but your code is leveraging my knowledge like a rocket.

I thank you very much. This is the best tutorial I have ever seen on the internet. Not only are you covering ASP MVC 3 but also you are describing the use of other items like Entity Framework and Server Compact, and also interaction between different objects.

I just wanted you to know this fact.

Kind regards.
